ComicInfo.Title: Snake in the Grass Part 1
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Snake in the Grass Part 1: The Joes in New Jersey battle Cobra Eels underwater. Bombstrike discovers Red Shadows are building new B.A.T.s in Olliestan; the Red Shadows capture her. Claire contacts Faoud in Benzheen and claims to have information on the Pit to sell him. Dawn pursues Zartan and demands he give her Morning Light.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-07 22:05:08. [CVDB540813] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:41:46. [Issue ID 1608263]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Jagdish Kumar,James Brown (J. Brown),John Rauch,John Royale,Robert Atkins,S.L. Gallant
ComicInfo.Characters: Dr. Cassandra Knox,Dawn Moreno,Torpedo,Bombstrike,Farik,Cobra Commander,Dr. Sidney Biggles-Jones,Anouk,Zartan,Cutter,Doctor Mindbender],Claire Hauser,Zarana,Red Shadows [Black Major],Polly,B.A.T.,Mainframe,Faoud,Baroness,G.I. Joe [Deep Six,Duke],Cobra [Cobra Eels,Shipwreck
